1003.name: Verthandi
1003.skill_desc:
Like <color=#EC85B8>Kindness Gift</color>

When the number of shelves selling <color=#EC85B8>gifts</color> in the store reaches max, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#EC85B8>Kindness Gifts</color> will be <color=#E78300>increased by 10.</color>

Otherwise, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#EC85B8>Kindness Gifts</color> will be <color=#E78300>reduced by 30</color>.

2002.name: Lingguang
2002.skill_desc:
Like <color=#7686A2>Good Product</color>

When the store sells only one type of <color=#7686A2>Good Product</color>, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#7686A2>Good Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>increased by 15.</color>

Otherwise, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#7686A2>Good Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>reduced by 30</color>.

2003.name: Mengzhang
2003.skill_desc:
Like <color=#7686A2>Good Product</color>

When <color=#297DE0>making repeated purchases of the same product</color>, the selling power of the shelf gradually decreases, <color=#E78300>decreasing by 20</color> each time.

<color=#297DE0>This resets after buying a different product.</color>

3002.name: Skadi
3002.skill_desc:
Like <color=#C3997E>Select Product</color>

When the store's <color=#297DE0>purchase route length</color> is greater than <color=#E78300>20</color>, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#C3997E>Select Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>increased by 30.</color>

Otherwise, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#C3997E>Select Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>reduced by 30</color>.

3003.name: Kingu
3003.skill_desc:
Like <color=#C3997E>Select Product</color>

When the store sells only one type of <color=#C3997E>Select Product</color>, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#C3997E>Select Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>increased by 15.</color>

Otherwise, the sales capacity of all shelves selling <color=#C3997E>Select Products</color> will be <color=#E78300>reduced by 30</color>.

4002.name: Hera
4002.skill_desc:
Like <color=#949287>Classic Treasure</color>

When buying <color=#297DE0>Haute Perfume</color>, the selling power of shelves <color=#E78300>increases by 20</color>.

4003.name: Tyr
4003.skill_desc:
Like <color=#949287>Classic Treasure</color>

The selling power of the shelves selling <color=#949287>Classic Treasure</color> in the store has been <color=#E78300>increased by 30</color>. The selling power of shelves selling <color=#297DE0>other products</color> has been <color=#E78300>decreased by 15</color>.
